title: Cryptolove20015
author: Cryptolove20015
created_time: February 23, 2023, 07:53:09 PMLast edit: March 11, 2023, 04:06:19 AM by Cryptolove20015
content: [Everyone please join our bounty community group] .  [Join here]_________________________________________________________                   Website     Twitter      Telegram      Instagram .   Discord      Telegram  _________________________________________________________                     1. The Bounty campaign will be managed                      by cryptolove 2. (20k$ NRFX) tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on February 24, 2023 and will run until March 3th, 2023.Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Cryptolove20015 may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joined campaigns if needed. Bounty Cryptolove20015 is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoing bounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread.Bounty Cryptolove20015 has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are only responsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Cryptolove20015 has. guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty."The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards by calculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet. Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published.However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their  targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can't guarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers. We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join Narfex official Telegrm  Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter Page.2. All participants must join Bounty Cryptolove20015Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter and                  YouTube Channel.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualificatio  from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Cryptolove20015 Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the   bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join. 7. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.8. Participants’ forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the Article and Video campaign.9. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable. Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.10. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.11. All participants have to submit their weekly reports(for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be countedProof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):                                        Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATION              Forum Username:              Forum Profile Link:              Telegram Username:              Participated Campaigns:              BSC Wallet Address: _____________ Week List ________________                                 Week 1(24.02-01.03)                                 Week 2(02.03-08.03)                                      Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/week                                Rules:  1. Every participant must follow Narfex ( Twitter page )2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #Narfex #cryptocurrencies #blockchain #DeFi #digitalassets                    _____ Google Form _____                          Rewards:                      5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name (Narfex)| (Example: cryptolave20015 )2. Replace your profile picture with Narfex Logo.                       Rules:1. Must join  (Narfex)Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency  group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!6. Participants must use #Narfex #cryptocurrencies               #blockchain #DeFi #digitalassets                       _________ Google Form _______                       Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/week                         Rules:  1. Every participant must follow Narfex ( Instagram page )2. Instagram accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. At least 5 likes and 5 comments per photo per week.5. Participants must use#Narfex #cryptocurrencies #blockchain #DeFi #digitalassets                         ________ Google Form _______                            Rewards:                      5 stakes/week                           Rules:1. Every participant must join Narfex  Discord Channel.2. Participants have to interact with each other on Narfex Discord channel.3. Participants have to write 5 constructive messages  each other per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 messages needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Meaningless,irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, try to help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either you can ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.6. Please take the screenshot of your message and upload it on Imgur or similar websites.Then submit that link during report submission.                     _________ Google Form ______Original article: 5 - 10 stakes, per participant in the campaign: Once every 3 days - max 2 articles per week ( 10 per campaign )● 1 comment - 1 steak (2 per day at most)(DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT)You can use social media for information:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium● Content topics:1) Whitelist is open - Public presale will be live on 26th on pinksale: Narfex on Medium https://medium.com/@narfex2) This is first meme token which is giving 2% reward .3) Also, its very first memes token aggregator which means holders will also get reward in other memes tokens (under development)4) Narfex  token holders can stake their Narfex  tokens and reward will be in shiba, babydoge, doge tokens as well its live as you can see here:5) lastly, community can create their own meme tokens and initiate presale here: Narfex on Medium https://medium.com/@narfex● “Applause” and Bookmark our Medium Press release● Write one comment every day about the project on other famous pages (2 per day at most) (DO NOT SPAM ON OFFICIAL PROJECT PAGES                         _________ Google Form _______
